document.full_text: donald trump has turned down an offer to drive the pace car at the indianapolis 500 because it would be "inappropriate" while he considers a possible 2012 run for the republican presidential nomination, race organizers said on thursday.
document.title: donald trump dumps offer to drive indy 500 pace car
lines_and_colors: donald trump has turned down an offer to drive the pace car at the indianapolis 500 because it would be "inappropriate" while he considers a possible 2012 run for the republican presidential nomination, race organizers said on thursday.
